data.actual_result: You can leave, your last edit will not be saved (the warning on the bottom does not appear)
data.expected_result: You are prompted to save or discard your changes
data.short_description: When changing perms, it is possible to leave without saving changes
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channels permission - Choose a permission from any role that is not overwritten - Either allow or disallow it - Click save (you may see the '/' flashing) - Change it back to how it was (to '/') - It does not always work. To retry, exit the settings and retry.
